api.name: Computer Fundamental (CF)
api.desc: Study about interection between Computer Software & Hardware, Basicaly all the basics about Computer System & it's components.

api.name: Digital Electronics (DE)
api.desc: Digital electronics is a field of electronics involving the study of digital signals and logic gates, number system, conversions of numbers, Flip Flops and many more.

api.name: Microcessor (MICRO)
api.desc: Introduction to microprocessor and microcomputers, 8086 Hardware specifications. Data movement & arithmatic instructions on actual 8086 microprocessor kit.

api.name: Programming in C (Prog. In C)
api.desc: Introduction to C programming language,history of c, operators, input output statements, datatypes, loops, compilation and execution and many more.

api.name: Communication Skills 1 (CS-I)
api.desc: Work on your personal communication Skills and other soft skills.

api.name: Mathematical Foundation (MF)
api.desc: Study of basic mathmatics that can be needed in programming. Study of set theory, cardinality, representation of set, graph theory, relation & function and many more.
